faqs.question: What is the purpose of this platform?
faqs.answer: This platform allows users to invest in movies before their release through fan cards, sharing profits based on box office collections.

faqs.question: How do I invest in a movie?
faqs.answer: You can invest by purchasing fan cards for a specific movie. Once the movie is released, you will receive a share of the profits based on the movieâ€™s performance.

faqs.question: How do I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach out to our support team via email or live chat available on our platform.

faqs.question: Are there any fees for investing?
faqs.answer: A small platform fee may be charged on investments to cover operational costs. Details are available on the investment page.
